name: ShipGates
description:
You're a bountry hunter that finds yourself lost above an unknown planet. Having just jumped away from your pursuers without fully checking where you were jumping too.

You find your self infront of a gate system, linking you to far off star systems allowing you to look for materials to repair your ship so that you may be able to jump again back to safety.

Notes

  • There is not much collision detection in this as I was focusing on the gate mechanics and getting that working correctly.
  • Assets are used under license from their respective asset stores.
  • If I had more time I would build out the Atmospheric level more along with adding collision detection and better/more sound effects.

Controls

     [W] - Accelerate

     [D] - Decelerate

     [A] - Yaw Left

     [D] - Yaw Right

     [Q/E] - Roll

     [Right Mouse Button Down + Mouse Move] - Pitch and Yaw

     [Space] - Skip Dialog
